query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `showcase_likes` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `videoSubmissionId` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_like` (`userId`, `videoSubmissionId`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `showcase_favorites` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `videoSubmissionId` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_favorite` (`userId`, `videoSubmissionId`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `showcase_comments` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `videoSubmissionId` int NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `parentId` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `maintenance_notices` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `startTime` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `endTime` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `isActive` int DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `traffic_stats` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `hourBucket` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `requestCount` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `uniqueUsers` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
